Articles.Content: The science lab in stock ksp is meant to be placed vertically and although we can still place it horizontally the IVA will not be correct. Also the vertical design does not seem to work well with complected terrain.

55 minutes ago, Maxi42 said:

The science lab in stock ksp is meant to be placed vertically and although we can still place it horizontally the IVA will not be correct. Also the vertical design does not seem to work well with complected terrain.

The stock game doesn't really have too many parts tailored to use in bases. If it's that important to you, look at mods.  Mk2 Expansion and Kerbal Planetary Base Systems both have labs that I use that are oriented horizontal and I'm sure there are many more.
